column4: hi, since some days now, i have no icons appearing on my desktop. if i browse my desktop using nautilus, the icons are still there. does anybody how i could resolve this? Thx
you mean the drive icons?
all icons, also files i have on the Desktop, nothing is shown
did you change your permissions or stuff like that??
no, i did not change permissions, i still have full access to my file from the command line or using nautilus
ok lets check ... type gksu users-admin
ok done
i have all privileges outside of send faxes and use tape drives
use external disks stuff too??
access externnal storage, yes
ok... pastebin your fstab and mtab
one sec
ya fine
my fstab:   http://paste.ubuntu.com/27943/
my mtab:   http://paste.ubuntu.com/27944/
were they workin before??
untill somedays ago, i have rebooted, and then it happened.
did it happen after a particular update
Ahhh, ok i found it (synaptic history)  my brother did install ubuntu  netbook remix,
i think it is caused by netbook remix, sorry for disturbing you with this :)
thats really fine... if it happens again... bug nautilus
ok thanks a lot
